Special on all new VPS orders with cPanel, Plesk CentOS, Debian, or Ubuntu will receive 50% OFF the 1st Month's service. You will also receive FREE MANAGED SERVICES + Upgraded RESOURCES!

All packages on our website are now listed to include the resource upgrades + UP TO 50% OFF the regular monthly service fees. OFFER GOOD ON ALL CPANEL, PLESK, CENTOS, DEBIAN, UBUNTU VPS PACKAGES.

COUPON CODE :: CUST2K10VPS
Use on checkout in coupon redemption field. DO NOT order managed services, we will add those free to your plan during provisioning automatically.

* 50% OFF 1st MONTH SERVICE.
* FREE LIFETIME Managed Services Promo.
* FREE LIFETIME Resource Upgrade Promo - 4TB bandwidth on plan 3 and up!

* DUAL QUAD CORE OR HIGHER PROCESSORS
* Choose your location : London (UK), Dallas, Seattle or Washington, D.C.!

EXPIRATION: Very limited amount of VPS's with this special are available. Offer is subject to end at management discretion when all available slots are sold.

RESTRICTIONS:
50% OFF the 1st month service plus LIFETIME MANAGED SERVICES. DO NOT order managed services, we will add those free to your plan during provisioning automatically. Not available on One Plan, Hybrids or Dedicated Servers.
